TV Shows 592263507530743
Friends Game of Thrones How I met your mother Scrubs Breaking Bad
comedy thriller fantasy
Follows the lives of six friends living in Manhattan. While a civil war brews between several noble families in Westeros, the children of the former rulers of the land attempt to rise up to power. Meanwhile a forgotten race, bent on destruction, return after thousands of years in the North. A father recounts to his children, through a series of flashbacks, the journey he and his four best friends took leading up to him meeting their mother. In the unreal world of Sacred Heart Hospital, intern John "J.D" Dorian learns the ways of medicine, friendship and life. A high school chemistry teacher diagnosed with inoperable lung cancer turns to manufacturing and selling methamphetamine, with his former student, in order to secure his familys financial future.
